review: Just hooked it up today, work fine and a nice set up,I have one from Sony. this Fire stick is easy to use
author: Leslie A Marsh

review: Very easy to install, now i can enjoy too many hours in front of my TV!
author: chrisi

review: Love it! Love it! Love it!
author: G. West

review: Works fine.  Had some trouble downloading the first software update (was very slow), but then it worked well.
author: Raymond Smith

review: Nothing good comes with a subscription of prime. You still have to rent/buy (which seems like) everything. My sole purpose of this stick is for Netflix.
author: Ashley

review: I really like the fire stick
author: Lisa

review: Works great! Family is enjoying it!
author: Sofie Bell

review: This works wonderfully. Quick and easy setup. We have tried it on 2 of our TVs. One of them is far away from the Wifi and on a different floor in our home, it still worked. We just ordered a second one.
author: Amazon Customer

review: My family and I are truly enjoying our Fire TV Stick, it is easy to use and safe for the children to navigate on their own with very little supervision.
author: DMA

review: OMG! We love this!!!! When we listen to one of the many radio stations it has beautiful slide shows of pictures from all over.... rain forests, mountains, etc...... truly hypnotizing!!!  You have so many choices with this fire TV stick!!! One of the best things I have ever bought from Amazon! Thank-you, Amazon!!!!
author: Puzzled
